column5: We just moved our trailer to Pigeon Lake and I am looking for some help locating fish. Mostly looking for musky, but have been told the lake doesn't have any. Help with any species is appreciated as I will be taking my son out and would like to hook into something. Thanks
you need to talk to different people

There are most certainly muskie in the Tri Lakes. I have seen guys trolling fast for muskie in the ares of Long Point Shoal and Three Sisters Shoals.Â  These spots can be found by simply looking at Google Maps.
Pigeon Lake has a good population of Muskies . Which end of the lake are you on ? I see you are new on the site try to send me a PM I can help you find some . Good Luck
Find the weed edges, find the muskie.
Thanks for the replys. Knowing the lake has them, I have lots of patience to search.
